contentList.content: Throughout history and the world, Vampires have been a terrifying force. Cloaked in darkness and mystery, these champions of shadow have taken many forms and committed many terrifying acts in the name of some greater evil. In this version, your vampire powers are tied to the very core of your being, while you claim your Title to truly separate yourself from the rest of the rabble.
Vampire Title focusing on shapeshifting into bestial forms
Use your Vampire Claws to attempt to restrain the opponent. Must pass an <LSTag Tooltip="Athletics">Athletics</LSTag> check.

Suck the blood from a living creature to regain [1]. The target takes [2] and [3]. Target must be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="STUNNED">Stunned</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SLEEPING">Sleeping</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHARMED">Charmed</LSTag>, Incapacitated, Restrained, or Unconscious.
Hit point maximum reduced by 1d4. Creature will die if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0.
Your claws now count as magical for the purposes of overcoming resistnaces.
You add your charisma modifier to the necrotic damage your bite attack does.
